page.title: 15Conservation around the Hurn
page.content: Most of the land around Holbeach Hurn and in this block is under various arable crops and horticulture.Many of the smallholders use organic fertilisers etc.as they are working on a small scale.Mr.Hardy who has a nursery in the Hurn uses fungicide to keep away disease in his crops,but he uses no insecticide as that would kill his bees and the ladybirds that kill his insects for him.Two large farms,Worth's and Thompson's,use mostly organic fertilisers etc. and Thompsons first introduced animals as natural fertilisers of the ground.Both farms have specially laid aside areas of bushes,trees,hedges and ponds for wildlife,and Mark Tinsley,although he uses standard chemical farm sprays,does not take up hedges.All 3 are doing their bit towards conservation.
